welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bovisio Masciago, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to discover all that our wonderful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for low-cost and domestic flights

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost airlines for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and bandwidth.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lugano Airport caters to VIP and private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
